name: 李建樂
objective:
本課程是研究所程度進階的巨量資料探勘與應用課程，主要介紹巨量資料探勘原理、方法與各種應用。並且介紹在處理巨量資料時常用的機器學習方法，如：類神經網路、SVM 等，和處理巨量資料的分散式計算基本架構。除了觀念的介紹外，透過程式設計的練習以及期末專題，能讓學生認識實際巨量資料探勘的程式設計以及機器學習等工具的應用方式。
This course introduces the concepts of big data mining and advanced applications in machine learning. Topics include big data concepts, methodologies, and various applications. Introducing machine learning methods commonly used in processing big data, such as neural networks and support vector machines, etc., as well as the basic architecture of distributed computing. In addition to the concept introduction, programming exercises, and term projects are included to help students understand the processing steps and practical tools in big data analytics.
